title: What is this font? Extinct (?) early 90's blackletter.
content:
Hey typophiles

Does anyone know the name of the font used here on this CD?  
 [http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/7840/10048925pt5.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317100633/http:/img444.imageshack.us/img444/7840/10048925pt5.jpg "http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/7840/10048925pt5.jpg")

It is to my knowledge one of the first computerized Blackletter fonts, with a quite short lifespan due to being replaced by more "impressive" versions such as the regular Old English.

Any help would be immensely appreciated!
author: BartholomeusRex

comments.content:
Please do type IDs only here: [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317100633/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

hhp
I think it's something like Stencil Old English Lucinda.
